name: For foodies and budding chiefs
tagline: A collection of gifts that are perfect for foodies and budding chiefs.

gifts.name: Marcato pasta maker
gifts.description: Help them raise their pasta game with this all time classic. Looks pretty cool on the kitchen island too.

image.alt_text: Image of Marcato pasta maker. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: MEATER meat thermometer
gifts.description: Cook to perfection every time with the best smart thermometer there is

image.alt_text: Image of MEATER meat thermometer. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Halen Mon sea salt in ceramic jar
gifts.description: The salt of choice for chefs around the world. And in a beautiful ceramic jar too. Perfect.

image.alt_text: Image of Halen Mon sea salt in ceramic jar. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Indigo Drop Ceramic Stand. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Sushi starter kit
gifts.description: Everything someone needs - except the fish - to have fun making sushi

image.alt_text: Image of Sushi starter kit. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Ravioli cutter gift set
gifts.description: Encourage the chief in your life to give ravioli ago... and test it with you.

image.alt_text: Image of Ravioli cutter gift set. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Chocolate mini brownie box
gifts.description: A delicious chocolate-y treat through the post. Yep.

image.alt_text: Image of Chocolate mini brownie box. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Sous chef gift vouchers. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: The Lionel - Just Cheese
gifts.description: A selection of cheese geeks most popular cheeses. A great starter for anyone new to cheesegeeks.

image.alt_text: Image of The Lionel - Just Cheese. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Handmade Ceramic Taco Truck. A great gift to give someone special.
